name: The GetIN!
description:
This is a serious game to learn about cybersecurity, by learning how to attack. 

It is part of my masterthesis and therefore I am happy for everyone who plays it, fills out the form and maybe provides me feedback.

The idea of this approx. 15 minutes lasting game is to get a little insight into how hackers try to attack their victims. 

No prior knowledge needed! - the game shows every click that is necessary.

The game is currently an POC, but if the feedback is good I will consider developing a full game out of it.

Have fun!

-M
